data.title: Golf Instruction
data.meta_description: Penn State Golf Course are situated deep in the rolling terrain of central Pennsylvania, another world of exhilarating golf awaits you! A place where carefully designed courses harmonize with the natural beauty of the surroundings. A place that will drive you to partake the challenges of the game you love.
data.text:
The Penn State Golf Courses offers golf instructional programs to meet each individual's needs. Our expertly trained PGA professionals are dedicated to making golf more fun and enjoyable with current and comprehensive golf instruction. Whether you are a beginner, intermediate, or accomplished golfer, you will find our instruction is designed to assist you with achieving your greatest potential. Private or group instruction is available. Please contact a member of our golf professional staff to schedule your instructional needs.

If interested in learning more about these programs, please contact our PGA Director of Instruction, Garret Cwalina at (814) 863-0257 or This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

Or Book Directly online for your next lesson by visiting Garret's website and lesson booking site: Click Here.

2024 Penn State Adult Group Classes

Our Get Golf Ready program is designed to help beginners get into the game of golf with ease. Golf can be an intimidating sport to get started with, but with the right instruction and guidance, it can be an incredibly rewarding experience. That’s why we’ve created Get Golf Ready, a program designed to help beginners learn the basics of golf and feel confident on the course.

Our program is tailored to players of all skill levels and includes a comprehensive series of lessons that will take you through everything from the fundamentals of the swing to the rules of the game. You will be learning from our experienced instructors who have a wealth of knowledge and experience in the game.

This is an excellent opportunity to learn the sport of golf with like-minded individuals who are just starting. You will get a chance to socialize, make new friends, and play golf in a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere.

We are now accepting signups for our Get Golf Ready program on our website. The program is open to members and non-members, so please feel free to invite your family and friends to join.

The price for each "Get Golf Ready" Golf School is $150 for eight hours of instruction, a Round of Golf on the White Course, and 10-small buckets of driving-range balls to practice. Please see the dates & times each program will be offered below

Get Golf Ready I

$150 for each School - (Includes 8 Hours of instruction, FREE Round of Golf & 10-Small Buckets of Balls)

Tuesday-Friday 5:30 PM-7:30 PM

To Register, please click the link below:

Week 1 April 16-19, 2024 - SOLD OUT

Week 2 May 14-17 2024 - SOLD OUT

Week 3 June 4-7, 2024 - SOLD OUT

Week 4 July 9-12, 2024 - SOLD OUT

Week 5 August 13-16, 2024 - SOLD OUT

If interested in learning more about this program or have questions, please contact our PGA Director of Instruction, Garret Cwalina at (814) 863-0257 orThis email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

2024 PGA Junior League

PGA Jr. League is a game-changing opportunity for boys and girls to learn and play golf. The program brings family and friends together around fun, team golf experiences with expert coaching from award-winning PGA Professionals. Our program begins in May and ends in August, junior golfers will play at Penn State, Belles Springs, Mountain View CC, Centre Hills CC, and Philipsburg Elks CC.

We are excited to announce that sign-ups for the PGA Jr. League are now available! The PGA Jr. League is a fantastic program that is designed to introduce boys and girls, ages 9-13, to the game of golf in a fun, social, and inclusive team format.

The program is run by the PGA of America, and teams consist of 8 to 12 players who receive coaching and guidance from our Director of Instruction, Garret Cwalina. These teams compete against other teams in a series of matches, which provides an excellent opportunity for young golfers to develop their skills and make new friends.

The PGA Jr. League emphasizes the development of character, sportsmanship, and skill, and provides a welcoming and inclusive environment for young golfers of all abilities. It is a fantastic way for kids to learn the game, improve their skills, and have fun playing with their peers.

If you have a child who is interested in golf, we encourage you to sign them up for the PGA Jr. League!. This is a great opportunity for them to learn the game, make new friends, and develop important life skills. We look forward to seeing you and your child on the golf course soon.

2024 Registration is NOW Available!!!

13 & Under Division: Register Here

14-17 Year Old Division: Register Here

If interested in registering or learning more about this program, please contact our PGA Director of Instruction, Garret Cwalina at (814) 863-0257 or This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

2024 Penn State Junior Golf Clinics

PGA Sports Academy is a FUN first program! Juniors will play games while learning the important skills needed to play golf. This is our introductory instructional program for juniors age 6-11, no equipment is needed, but may be purchased if your child becomes interested in golf. Students will be assigned to groups according to skill and age level. Students will be instructed on various skills including; putting, chipping, sand play, and full swing. Rules, etiquette, and course management will also be addressed.

Programs: Monday-Friday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM

Friday morning is our Play like a Pro day, parents or guardians will Caddie for their child out on the golf course. This is a great way for the child to show everything they learned during camp and have FUN playing golf.

Space is limited, so sign-up your junior golfer up today!

To Register, please click the link below:

Camp 1: June 10-14, 2024 (Masters Theme Week) - SOLD OUT

Camp 2: June 24-28, 2024 (Football Theme Week) - SOLD OUT

Camp 3: July 8-12, 2024 (Sciene Theme Week) - SOLD OUT

Camp 4: July 22-26, 2024 (Summer Olympics Theme Week) - SOLD OUT

Camp 5: August 5-9, 2024 (Creative Skills Theme Week) - SOLD OUT

Camp 6: August 19-23, 2024 (Future Stars Theme Week) - SOLD OUT

Junior Program Fee: $150 for each Week-Long Program, Monday-Friday 9:00AM-11:00AM

If interested in learning more about this program or have questions, please contact our PGA Director of Instruction, Garret Cwalina at (814) 863-0257 or This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

2024 Penn State Coaches Day Camp for Junior Golfers

Penn State Golf Day Camp: June 17-20, 2024

The Penn State Coaches Day Camps are geared for students entering grades five through twelve next fall. Campers are divided up according to age and experience. Juniors are taught by top collegiate coaches and PGA teaching professionals. A wide variety of topics will be covered as well as the opportunity each day to play on the course.

Instruction will include course management, strategies, self-management skill for optimal performance, short game mastery, and full swing mastery. Lectures, demonstrations, and application will focus on the skills players need to take their game to the collegiate level.

For more information or to register, visit Penn State Sports Camps by Clicking-Here or call (814) 865-0561.

2024 Nittany Lion Golf Schools

2024 NITTANY LION GOLF SCHOOLS @ Penn State:

Golf School #1: May 17-19, 2024 - SOLD OUT

Golf School #2: June 21-23, 2024 - SOLD OUT

Golf School #3: June 28-30, 2024 - SOLD OUT

Golf Instruction with former Penn State Women’s Golf Coach Denise St. Pierre and Teaching Professional Mary Kennedy Zierke!

”Curiosity is our best teacher!” Have you been curious on why, what and how to elevate your game? We will explore with you why, what and how, to get what you want from the game!

We will cover all skill areas of the game and include on course instruction.

*All schools will run Friday 1:00-4:00PM, Saturday 9:00AM-2:30PM (includes lunch), and Sunday 9:00AM-11:30AM

If interested in registering for a Nittany Lion Golf School, please contact Former Penn State Women's Head Golf Coach Denise St. Pierre at (814) 329-0456 or email her at This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
